description: Retrieves information about the specified target group.

parameters.name: targetGroupIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID or ARN of the target group.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the target group.

nested_items.name: healthCheck
nested_items.description: The health check configuration. Not supported if the target group type is LAMBDA or ALB.

nested_items.name: enabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether health checking is enabled.

nested_items.name: healthCheckIntervalSeconds
nested_items.description: The approximate amount of time, in seconds, between health checks of an individual target. The range is 5---300 seconds. The default is 30 seconds.

nested_items.name: healthCheckTimeoutSeconds
nested_items.description: The amount of time, in seconds, to wait before reporting a target as unhealthy. The range is 1---120 seconds. The default is 5 seconds.

nested_items.name: healthyThresholdCount
nested_items.description: The number of consecutive successful health checks required before considering an unhealthy target healthy. The range is 2---10. The default is 5.

nested_items.name: httpCode
nested_items.description: The HTTP code to use when checking for a successful response from a target.

nested_items.name: path
nested_items.description: The destination for health checks on the targets. If the protocol version is HTTP/1.1 or HTTP/2, specify a valid URI (for example, /path?query). The default path is /. Health checks are not supported if the protocol version is gRPC, however, you can choose HTTP/1.1 or HTTP/2 and specify a valid URI.

nested_items.name: port
nested_items.description: The port used when performing health checks on targets. The default setting is the port that a target receives traffic on.

nested_items.name: protocol
nested_items.description: The protocol used when performing health checks on targets. The possible protocols are HTTP and HTTPS. The default is HTTP.

nested_items.name: protocolVersion
nested_items.description: The protocol version used when performing health checks on targets. The possible protocol versions are HTTP1 and HTTP2.

nested_items.name: unhealthyThresholdCount
nested_items.description: The number of consecutive failed health checks required before considering a target unhealthy. The range is 2---10. The default is 2.

nested_items.name: ipAddressType
nested_items.description: The type of IP address used for the target group. Supported only if the target group type is IP. The default is IPV4.

nested_items.name: lambdaEventStructureVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the event structure that your Lambda function receives. Supported only if the target group type is LAMBDA. The default is V1.

nested_items.name: port
nested_items.description: The port on which the targets are listening. For HTTP, the default is 80. For HTTPS, the default is 443. Not supported if the target group type is LAMBDA.

nested_items.name: protocol
nested_items.description: The protocol to use for routing traffic to the targets. The default is the protocol of the target group. Not supported if the target group type is LAMBDA.

nested_items.name: protocolVersion
nested_items.description: The protocol version. The default is HTTP1. Not supported if the target group type is LAMBDA.

nested_items.name: vpcIdentifier
nested_items.description: The ID of the VPC. Not supported if the target group type is LAMBDA.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the target group was created, in ISO-8601 format.

nested_items.name: failureCode
nested_items.description: The failure code.

nested_items.name: failureMessage
nested_items.description: The failure message.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the target group.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the target group was last updated, in ISO-8601 format.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the target group.

nested_items.name: serviceArns
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the service.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The target group type.
